titles.title: Oh Lord have pity on me

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Oh Lord have pity on me;
As I call on you all the day long.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Since I was born;
Lord sinful I have been.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've sinned against you;
Lord wash my sins away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In true repentance;
Now I cry and weep.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Far from your presence;
Do not banish me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Your Holy Spirit;
Do not take from me.
